fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar

Class FileMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JMenuItem
              • javax.swing.JMenu
                • fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FileMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerEventSender, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class FileMenu
extends javax.swing.JMenu
implements ControllerEventSender
    File menu JMenu. Contains the "Open", "Save", "Quit" options, etc. JMenuItems fire the appropriate command with any File (saving, or loading)
    See Also:
    FileMenu(javax.swing.JFrame), setOptionsText(java.util.Map), Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setOptionsText

        public void setOptionsText(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
        Set the text of the file menu options. Replaces the text of each JMenuItem with the passed in map value if it finds a file option which matches the corresponding key.
        Parameters:
        options - Map of keys (options to replace the text of) and values (text to replace the text with).
